data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Genève, Switzerland to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Genève, Switzerland
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 191,021 lost in Genève that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary: On average, 17 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Genève, Switzerland.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Please, convict the 7,979 believers in Genève, Switzerland to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 7,979 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Genève, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 7,979 believers in Genève that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Genève, Switzerland the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
